title: State Department Plans $400 Million Purchase of Tesla Cybertrucks
summary: State Department procurement documents showed plans for a 400 million purchase of armored Tesla vehicles, dramatically expanding a smaller Biden-era EV plan. After media scrutiny, the State Department removed Tesla from documents and claimed the purchase was on hold with no plans to proceed.
description: The State Department announced plans to purchase $400 million worth of armored Tesla Cybertrucks, directly benefiting Elon Musk's company through government contracts.
